title: roswear Women's Wide Leg Petite Jeans High Waisted Stretchy Cropped Denim Pants
description: Comfortable Fabric: Made with stretchy denim fabric, these baggy denim pants ensure maximum comfort and flexibility, allowing you to move freely and comfortably throughout the day without feeling restricted

Elegant Wide Leg Feature: Being equipped with a wide leg style, it adds a touch of elegance and presents a modern and stylish look. The ankle length is ideal for showing off your favorite shoes and creating a balanced proportion
Unique Seam Design: Adding a stylish element to the boyfriend jeans, making them stand out from the ordinary, which adds a touch of visual interest to your outfit

Versatile Button Detail: Featuring a three button design that helps to cinch in your waist and create a sleek silhouette, which is suitable for various occasions, from casual outings to semi-formal events
Size Tips: Amazon generic size chart is NOT our size. Please carefully refer to our detailed size chart on the left picture before you purchase
